name: The Ovington Dining Table
description: A large deluxe dining table exuding the utmost style and comfort, the Ovington is designed with a sociable oval top that is perfect for entertaining. DAVIDSON is committed to providing a bespoke service and all our tables are available in any of the luxury finishes from our range. The table is exceptionally beautiful in our rich, dark finishes which enhance the luxury feel of the design with a beautiful high gloss or satin sheen that is highly durable and easy to clean. The Ovington dining table draws the eye with its graceful legs coming together to surround a rectangular high gloss back lacquer block, all standing on a sleek and angular facetted base. Perfect proportion meets exquisite finishing, leading the way in contemporary British furniture design at its best.
